snippet: Comments by Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. amounted to a vigorous defense of two of his colleagues on the Supreme Court, Justices Clarence Thomas and Elena Kagan.
abstract: Chief Justice John G Roberts Jr delivers in his annual report on the state of the federal judiciary a vigorous defense of his colleagues Justices Clarence Thomas and Elena Kagan; Kagan and Thomas have faced calls to recuse themselves from hearing the challenge to the 2010 health care overhaul law.
lead_paragraph: Comments by Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. amounted to a vigorous defense of two of his colleagues on the Supreme Court, Justices Clarence Thomas and Elena Kagan.
